Issue.creator: tongliofcary
Issue.summary: build target change caused containers not being found
Issue.description: fabric build target docker has been reduced not to build zookeeper, kafka and couchdb images. this change breaks the ansible agent when docker is a build target but the images are missing. We need to change this to allow compose and k8s draw specific zookeeper, kafka, fabric-ca and couchdb images from docker hub.
